website_summaries.verdict: If ventilation is a priority for you, this is an excellent choice.
pros: This helmet stands out for its generous ventilation and lightweight design, both of which make it a great option for those who are used to riding without a helmet
The Roc Loc 5.5 MIPS adjustment system is easy to use to find a good fit whether you're wearing a cycling cap or not
cons: The straps are prone to twisting, which can be uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: All you need to know about this helmet is that it replaces one that I had bought previously, but I needed to replace it because I ran over it with my extended cab pickup truck. While it was damaged enough that I needed to replace it, you should see how little damage was done to the helmet even though I ran over it with my truck. I think it is testament to how well this helmet is made, and how well it protects the head.
customer_reviews.author: Psychref

customer_reviews.title: No lean, adjustable fit is dope.
customer_reviews.text: Fits right. Doesn't lean. Adjustable fit is easy and snug. light weight. Easy Ear adjustors are what every helmet needs. Stop making other helmets. Make this one in 15 different colors and it will be the perfect helmet for any kit. Paid under $100 for it. That means alot too.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Adjust the straps!
customer_reviews.text: This product is still amazing even without the mips. Affordable, lightweight, looks great, but more importantly protects the skull. People have complained about the strapping system. I haven't had a problem after I adjusted the straps to comfortably fit flush on the sides of my face. The strapping is a little lightweight in comparison to what it formerly was, and people have noticed that too. This helmet still fits me great, and I'm not worried about the straps. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: GroovyMan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable. I hope to never find out if it works. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I'm doing just fine. I'd definitely buy this helmet again to protect ...
customer_reviews.text: It does what a helmet does. I crashed on my bike, hit my head on the ground, and I'm doing just fine. I'd definitely buy this helmet again to protect my noggin!
customer_reviews.author: BrownTown

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the helmet but the straps. Try, try and try again to no avail finding a perfect position for them against my face.
customer_reviews.author: Miko

customer_reviews.title: Giro Savant - nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice for what I was looking for. Great quality, excellent fit. Plus Giro knows how to make great helmets... Pleased with my choice. Definitely can recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Dise

customer_reviews.title: B+
customer_reviews.text: This is a good helmet, but the straps are corny and don’t lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value helmet
customer_reviews.text: Really good helmet for the money. Gave four stars because it is obviously not the top of the line, but for the money it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Shy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. Fit is super comfortable and it is very well ventilated.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: protect yo brains
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful helmet. I appreciate the adjustability. Please review size chart before buying.
customer_reviews.author: TheIronDruid

customer_reviews.title: Misleading.... thought it was MIPS. ...
customer_reviews.text: Misleading....thought it was MIPS....was not. Search the "Giro Savant MIPS" and the picture also show the MIPS sticker on the product. When I got delivered it was old model of Savant NO MIPS.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Joo

customer_reviews.title: Not a MIPS helmet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Photo clearly shows this is a MIPS helmet. Upon arrival it it clearly NOT a MIPS helmet! Very disappointed and will be returning. Misleading and should be flagged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Giro Savant Adult Road Cycling Helmet
product_meta.description: The Savant is an amazing fit for riders who enjoy great routes as much as a swift pace. The slim shape combines impressive ventilation thanks to 25 wind tunnel vents and the comfortable convenience of the adjustable Roc Loc 5 fit and stability system. And with the lightweight and durability of in-mold construction, it won't weigh you down.
feature_bullets: In-Mold construction reinforces the area around the vents and ribs, creating a one-piece exoskeleton, which allows the helmet to be lighter, more durable and better ventilated than traditional designs
25 Wind Tunnel vents with internal channels thrust cool, fresh air over and around your head while forcing heat and stale air out

Quite possibly the best-fitting retention system you've ever experienced, the Roc Loc 5 easily adjusts both fit tension and vertical position with a single hand, plus it's 40% lighter than its popular predecessor, Roc Loc 4
Suggested Use: Enthusiast Road, Triathlon, Touring, Urban/Commute, Cruiser/Casual
